Malice:
 
He calmed somewhat, listening to the femme holding him close.  He said nothing, and when she kissed him, it was an experiance that was without compare.  He deepened the kiss, not wanting the moment to end.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
BlackNightmare:

BlackNightmare huged him and in low voice she said in his ear"I'll 
tell you, not here, not now... try to rest... and act as anything is 
happening or we will lost"

She kissed him, with appasion. POerhaps it may be the last kiss that 
she could give him

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice:
>  
> The chamber was dimly lit, the lights hanging from the ceiling.  
The walls were shreds of metal, with Malice on the floor.  He 
climbed to one foot, and turned a pained optic to th femme.
> "Who is she?  Why does her image haunt my spark so?  It's like I 
know her, but I know I've never seen her!  Who is she?" he said, 
before another wave of pain washed through his processors.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackNightmare:
> 
> Blacknightmare woke up and left her chamber completely healed, but 
> her heart was tearing apart too. When she heard Malice's voice 
> screaming with pain, she knew that she has to do something. She 
> opened the door of his chamber and looking to him, she said "Are 
you 
> ok?" 
> 
> Her face mirriowed pain.
> 
>

went

> room, along with pounding on the wall.  Inside the locked door,

scream 
> in agony.
> > "WHAT'S WRONG WITH ME?  WHO IS SHE?  WHY DO I KNOW HER?  WHAT'S 
> GOING ON?"he cried as he fell to his knees and clutched his head.
